flawed_nl_solution:
He used 1/3 of his tank because 1 - (2/3) = 1/3
He used 36 gallons of gas because 12 x (1/3) = <<12*1/3=36>>36
He drove 20 miles because 2 x 10 = <<2*10=20>>20
He gets 5/9 miles per gallon because 20 / 36 = <<20/36=5/9>>5/9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 36. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
